description: This file provides helper functions for managing MongoDB collections related to connections, tokens, sync states, and audit logs within a unified connector persistence layer. It includes functions for upserting connection records, encrypting/storing tokens, retrieving tokens, managing sync states, and logging audit events.

methods.name: AsyncIOMotorCollection _col(name: str)
methods.description: Returns the specified MongoDB collection from the database.

methods.name: str upsert_connection(workspace_id: str, connector_id: str, name: str, config: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Creates or updates a connection record in the 'connections' collection, returning the connection ID.

methods.name: str store_token(connection_id: str, token_plaintext: str, expires_at: Optional[datetime])
methods.description: Encrypts and stores a token for a given connection, returning the token record ID.

methods.name: Optional[str] fetch_token_plaintext(connection_id: str)
methods.description: Fetches and decrypts the latest token for a connection, returning None if not found.

methods.name: None put_sync_state(connection_id: str, cursor: Optional[str])
methods.description: Upserts the sync state cursor for a connection.

methods.name: Optional[str] get_sync_state(connection_id: str)
methods.description: Retrieves the current sync cursor for a connection.

methods.name: str append_audit(actor: str, action: str, target_type: str, target_id: str, meta: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Appends an audit log entry with specified details.

ctags.name: append_audit

ctags.signature: (actor: str, action: str, target_type: str, target_id: str, meta: Dict[str, Any])

ctags.name: put_sync_state
ctags.pattern: /^async def put_sync_state(connection_id: str, cursor: Optional[str]) -> None:$/

ctags.pattern: /^async def store_token(connection_id: str, token_plaintext: str, expires_at: Optional[datetime]) /

ctags.name: upsert_connection
ctags.pattern: /^async def upsert_connection(workspace_id: str, connector_id: str, name: str, config: Dict[str, A/
ctags.signature: (workspace_id: str, connector_id: str, name: str, config: Dict[str, Any])
